Articles.Content:
I can't log in to the KSP Wiki.

Here's what happens: my information is auto-filled, so I enter my correct password, then a text box comes up saying that "the Terms" were updated on March 6, 2018. So I agree, but it resets the fields, and gives me an incorrect password error. So I try again, but even though I agreed, THE BOX ASKING ME TO AGREE TO THE TERMS STILL COMES UP.

And this didn't just start today. It's been going on for a YEAR. I can log on to the wiki on my phone, but not my desktop. Why has this bug not been caught and fixed?
Hey @BNSF1995 I found a temporary fix, please try again.

You. Are. A lifesaver.

Couldn't have asked for a better birthday present (actually I could, but I'll take anything since my party isn't until Sunday). So, thanks for that, man!
